Quickstrike:





The cold was awful stuff on an all metallic bot like Quickstrike. 
Only his cobra arm was made out of an artificial flesh on the 
outside. And counting that his energy was weak wasn't helping. He 
couldn't run his core temperature as high as he wanted to warm 
himself. Slag it to the Pit, he wasn't happy here. He was paranoid 
that the others could kill him, and it was all about this strange 
damage that he didn't know what to make of it.

He could stay out here as much as he could until he found out what 
was wrong, or forcing his body to fix it. He kept on walking, 
stepping high against the snow.
